doc: A pathname to be used as input.
A string to be used as input (unless parameter pathName is present too)
A string to be added before the processed pathname (i.e., pre-pended with no separator)
A string to be added after the processed pathname (i.e., appended with no separator)
A string to be used as quotation to the processes pathname with prefic/suffix, if any. Can include one or more characters.
Sets the amount of log messages. Values larger than 0 will make the worker write more and more detailed log reports.
